name: PureEnrichment
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Pure Enrichment app work in harmony to help you operate all your Pure Enrichment smart appliances. 

Simply ask Alexa to turn on, turn off, or change the fan speed on your air purifier. There’s no need to walk over to the appliance and control it manually. Just speak the voice command to your compatible Echo device.

To connect Alexa to the Pure Enrichment app:
1. Download the Pure Enrichment app from the App Store or Google Play Store.
2. Set up your account within the app.
3. You will need to have your Pure Enrichment appliance nearby.
4. Configure your Pure Enrichment appliance within the app and assign the product nickname that will be used in voice commands.
5. Download the Amazon Alexa app from the App Store, Google Play Store, or Amazon Appstore
6. Configure your Echo device with the Amazon Alexa app.
7. Search the “Pure Enrichment” Alexa skill in the Alexa Skill Store
8. Enter your Pure Enrichment account username and password. 
9. You’re all set! 

You can now enjoy voice control of your Pure Enrichment smart appliances with the following commands:

Air Purifier
“Alexa, turn on air purifier.”
“Alexa, set air purifier fan speed to Low.”
“Alexa, set air purifier fan speed to High.”
“Alexa, set air purifier to Auto.” 
“Alexa, set air purifier to Sleep.” 
“Alexa, turn on child lock for air purifier.”
